file_content.text: Like father, like son.
Couldn't convince him to stop. Sorry.
One of you actually here to pick up Jicoln, or you all here to gawk?
Are we done wasting my time?
Sorry, ma'am. Double-time!
Sorry, sir. Double-time!
I didn't come for my father.
I didn't come for the traitor.
I'm used to this sort of thing by now.
Don't sweat it.
One for the road.
I was between killings anyway.
I didn't come for the fight. I've a favor to ask.
I want to come with you.
I don't take on passengers.
This isn't a shuttle.
Didn't get enough of me yet?
[Flirt] I'll bet you do.
Guess not.
I don't mind you tagging along.
Always room for one more.
I'm not along for the ride.
You're gonna end up in front of a firing squad if you keep leaving your post.
You running off again?
Commander Fett agreed.
I mean to serve, join your hunts, earn respect for my clan.
Well, at least he's not a chatterbox like the little snow rat.
I'm for it. Ship's pretty boring when you're off doing your thing.
Be nice to have a man on the ship, besides Gault.
How could you say no to a face like that?
What do you say, big guy?
New friend can share room with Blizz. Blizz move scrap pile to Gault room.
New friend want to share room with Blizz? Blizz give new friend top bunk.
Give me this honor.
Keep pace, or I'll leave you behind. Got it?
Be ready to work.
I'm ready.
I'm flattered, kid. Welcome aboard.
The honor's mine.
Thank you.
Do what I tell you and we won't have a problem.
Just follow orders, or else.
Understood.
We're finished.
Tell the commander I'm not returning.
We're done. Coming, Torian?
Nope.
Tch. You can finally show your face, and now you're running off. Try to make something of yourself, arue'tal.
Ready when you are.
Almost missed you, shabuir. It was kind of fate to keep you here.
The traitor's in cargo. Don't keep me waiting.
Just take what you came for.
I'm not here for the traitor.
This guy have a reason to be in my face?
What's his problem, Torian?
You got something you want to say to me?
I don't like your tone.
You killed my boy. Now you're going to answer for that.
I gave your boy every opportunity to walk away.
So you're Jogo's father.
There's only one way for this to end. With you, dead at my feet.
Did I?
His name was Jogo. And I'll carve it into your skull so you never forget.
Shoulda taught him to shoot with his blaster instead of his mouth.
That brat was asking for it.
You should take your own advice.
I challenge you to a blood duel.
It's your funeral.
If that's what you want.
I can't really refuse, now can I?
You leave me no choice.
I wouldn't let you, even if you did.
Any other relatives I should lay to rest while I'm at it?
You're so dead.
If you weren't Mando, I'd have half my clan take you apart one piece at a time.
Marn, you're my second.
Is this weakling going to act as yours?
Darn right!
Of course, wouldn't want someone to cheat.
Blizz always be second to boss!
No, I am.
Torian's my second.
Suits me fine.
Glad to see you've still got my back.
Thanks, kid.
We've got it covered. Just stay out of the way.
No, you're not.
Understood.
Guess you're all alone here.
I'm her second.
I'm his second.
Hmph. Like father, like son. Always picking the wrong side.
Par Jogo!
Kill this trash.
Burc'ya. Wasting no time earning new honors, I see. We've been sent to collect the traitor from you.
Nothing else on my plate.
You won't be sitting idle for long. Times are about to get interesting.
Let's get something straight. Just because you're a Mandalorian doesn't make us buddies.
We aren't friends.
Never liked you anyway, champion.
Champion. I hear you're still catching big game. We've been sent to collect the traitor from you.
He's in the cargo bay.
Help yourself.
I only do things big.
You're good at what you do, no one can argue that.
Carrying my honors suits you.
Whatever, errand boy.
You--I have my orders.
We'll make this quick.
Need to ask you a favor, champion.
All right, kid, the kolto's treated most of the major damage.
Should have left me. You've given the traitor too much time.
There's only so far he can go. We'll find him eventually.
Time isn't a factor.
Better keep at him. He'll be easier to track on the run.
Saving you was the priority.
At least I get another crack at him.
A "thank you" might be nice.
Sorry. Thanks.
The traitor sacrificed his stockpile to escape. He'll be scavenging now.
Most likely, he'll steal from nearby outposts.
This is a battlefield, who knows how many outposts have been thrown up and torn down around here.
That doesn't narrow it down.
We'll make do.
Sounds right.
He'll be looking to put as much distance between me and him as possible.
I gotta disagree.
Not with his wounds. In this swamp, he'd go septic in a day.
We should update our tactical maps at an Imperial outpost. Then search for signs of the traitor at any outposts nearby.
This should help stop the bleeding.
T--thanks... I can staunch this.
Save my honor.
Smell like Blizz workshop--uh-oh.
So much for that plan.
Torian!
Torian. Where's Jicoln?
Got cocky. He's tricky.
Electro-net put him down, but--used it to cook off his munition cache.
He's running. Don't let the trail go cold.
Does Jicoln have another hideaway?
Where could he be going?
Didn't see one. Doesn't matter, you can catch him.
What trail? Jicoln's long gone.
You let him get away.
No. He won't be covering his tracks.
Better the trail goes cold than you.
I'm not leaving you like this.
I'll be fine... just get him!
He's hurt, bleeding, running. Deep tracks, bloody mud, straight lines... even you could follow.
We're finishing this together, Torian. It's not up for discussion.
No. I won't leave you behind.
So close....
He's not getting away from me this time.
On my way.
I'm at the coordinates. No sign of Jicoln. Just some sort of marker.
Not good.
Holy--hey... hey, if you want me to steal your ship and run, then just lie still and don't move....
Boss! It be okay! Blizz shield you!
Oh! Hey, are you alright?
You okay? What happ--
Challenge accepted.
Jicoln's taking potshots at me; I need to know where I'm headed. Now.
I need directions, Torian.
If that's how you want to play, Jicoln....
Oh, he's dead.
That was a cheap shot, Jicoln!
Hey, I wasn't ready!
Transmission cut out.
Transmitting coordinates. Should be all of the traitor's honors.
Contact you when I've found his bolt hole. Torian out.
Nasty trap. You okay?
Low on ammo!
Torian. I've cleared a path to some kind of vault.
On my way.
Ah! What is that?
My communicator must be picking something up down here.
Feedback, I think.
Something's emitting high or low frequency sound.
How should I know? I thought it was you.
You sure it's not on your end?
Hold on, Torian! Stupid communicator's on the fritz.
Hunk of junk!
Don't think it's our equipment. Something's going on down there.
Blizz think it coming from this thing.
It's whipping the rakghouls into a frenzy.
They're coming out of the woodwork. Moving on your position!
I--I think I hear them... a lot of them!
Let's bolt before they corner... too late.
Blizz got it! Uh-oh....
It's been a while--
Ah! Hear that?
Blizz hear it too.
Nothing?
I don't hear anything.
No, what?
Well, what's the matter?
High-pitched whine.
This is bad.
Something's not right.
You ain't the only one.
Trap!
Blizz got it! Uh-oh....
I really don't like the sound of that...!
I hate always being right....
Mind your distance.
Hey. Smelled you coming.
I've got the rakghoul byproducts you asked for.
Here are the materials.
You're not funny.
No joke.
Next time, you're the one digging through sewage.
I'm not doing this again.
You know botany? Didn't think so. I got everything else.
Let me. This'll take a minute.
Stuff'll throw a rakghoul off my trail, but in their den? Keep your blaster ready.
If these things attack, I'm going to open up with everything I've got.
Noted.
I'll keep behind you.
So what's this gunk supposed to do, exactly?
How's this stuff work?
Mask our scent, tranquilize.
Ugh, that stuff's burning a hole through my helmet's air filters.
That smells awful.
Worst case, you'll gag.
Smear it thick. If the fumes put the rakghouls out, we might sneak through.
Oh no, no way. I'm not getting that... whatever, all over--this is my best shirt!
Nice knowing you.
Wait, wait, wait... just do it. Ugh, now I'm gonna have to burn these.
Smell like when Blizz fall in old refresher tank.
Wow, that's a smell... if I pass out, please don't leave me behind.
Got a way to throw off rakghouls, but I'll need help. Materials.
What sort of materials am I looking for?
Just tell me what you need.
Good as done.
Fresh rakghoul bodily fluids--both blood and waste--and a decomposing rakghoul. Least a week old.
Check these waypoints. We'll rendezvous at the transport station.
I'm pressed for time; I'll just go in guns blazing.
Let's just shoot them.
You're the expert.
I'll catch up. Here's the hive's coordinates and my holofrequency.
I don't like thi--yup, definitely don't like this.
Don't shoot Blizz! Only looking!
Aw, crud.
Thought you'd be harder to get the drop on.
Put that away, before we have a problem.
Lower that weapon.
I see you're doing well, and here I was worried about you.
That how you treat a friend?
Just having a little fun.
You were one of those kids hunting Sithspawn on Dromund Kaas.
Hey, I know you.
You remembered.
I was just eager to see you again after Dromund Kaas.
[Flirt] Hi cutie. [Disarm him]
You what--
Men.... Time to tell me what you're doing out here.
Ow... I deserved that.
You must like him. If I tried that, I'd be wearing my face on the back wall.
Oh, yeah you did.
Bad idea, kid.
It is. [Disarm him.]
Now you're gonna tell me what you're doing out here.
Ahh. Hst... more what I had in mind.
If a bloody nose is the worst you take out of here, you're ahead of most.
You not mess with boss. Boss beat up people better than anybody!
Won't do that again, I'll bet.
You're not here for me. Who, then?
I'm hunting Jicoln Cadera.
Your father.
You won't like the answer to that.
Better you don't know.
The traitor....
Same person I bet you're looking for. Dear old dad.
Who do you think, traitor?
Thought I'd lead you to him?
I'm looking too, but not for a reunion. To reclaim my clan's honor.
You found any sign of Jicoln?
Had any luck?
We'll restore your honor, Torian. You've got my word.
I'll help you.
Thanks.
That could be a conflict of interest. It's my job to kill him.
You better not be a problem.
Won't get in your way. Just have to face him.
I promise you, I can find him. I already know where to start.
Someone's erected dew collectors, beast traps, around an old transport station. Have to be the traitor's.
I'll judge for myself.
Show me.
What's so special about dew collectors and traps?
How's that any indication?
That junk could belong to anybody.
You're wasting my time.
Even scavengers can bring in supplies. They're Jicoln's.
I've only found one entrance into the station. It's thick with rakghouls. Risky.
If that's how you want it.
You'll need me to pick up the traitor's trail again.
It'll be easier with one less set of feet. No offense.
Torian, you're with me.
All right, come with me now.
Ready when you are.
All right, come with me now.
You better be up for this.
Just don't slow me down.
I've fought through worse.
Why should I count on you?
I'll find him.
Mako, head back to the ship but keep an ear out for word on Jicoln.
On it. Be careful, you two.
Take a break, Gault. You're looking like a half-drowned Cathar.
Great. I'm gonna take a nice long bath, or twelve.
Good work, Blizz. We've got it from here.
Blizz glad to help. Blizz had fun in soggy place!
I'll get you some kolto first.
